spells.name: Wand-Lighting Charm
spells.description: Illuminates the tip of your wand

spells.name: Disarming Spell
spells.description: Knocks your opponent's wand out of their hand

spells.name: Unlocking Charm
spells.description: Unlocks a locked portal or door

spells.name: Summoning Charm
spells.description: Brings an object from elsewhere into your hand

spells.name: Imperius Curse
spells.description: Forces someone to do something against their will
